ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List selfhosted runners for an organization
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List selfhosted runners for an organization
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Lists all self-hosted runners configured in an organization.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List self-hosted runners for an organization

Lists all self-hosted runners configured in an organization. You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint.

Method: Get

OperationID: actions/list-self-hosted-runners-for-org

EndPoint:

/orgs/{org}/actions/runners
